nodes.text:
And it NEEDS to set one.

It can't be an isolated reception to the rule because the world is watching. Because they're afraid of civil unrest. It has to bring about active change, otherwise this is all for nothing. 

I guess we'll see.
Exception**\n\nPretty sure that was spelled correctly when I submitted it. What the everloving fuck...

And to top things off, I ended the stream with some amazing news: Derek Chauvin convicted on all charges. I known in somr respects, he is an example that it's being set, but I hope that this sentencing sets a precedent in fighting back against police brutality.
